pages.title: Example Page
pages.summary:
Title here! This is an example page that demonstrates the capabilities of a Markdown page in cState.
You can use HTML if the file extension is .html, but this one is .md.
Let us dive in.
Paragraphs are separated by a blank line.
2nd paragraph. Italic, bold, and monospace. Itemized lists look like:
this one that one the other one Note that — not considering the asterisk — the actual text content starts at 4-columns in.
